description: Save multiple files in the specified project. The fileContents parameter must be in XML format representing multiple file contents: <files><file path='string'><![CDATA[ file-content-string ]]></file></files>

projectName.description: Project name, must be a valid file directory name

fileContents.description: XML formatted string containing multiple file contents in the format: <files><file path='string'><![CDATA[ file-content-string ]]></file></files>
